title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; fetch-like interface to Ollama endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support, model manager & plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming responses, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt history, syntax highlighting & themes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ready-to-run Python notebook.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline coding assistants with autocomplete & explain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaEmbedder nodes for production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers & Blazor sample.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection & autoscaling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama chat & embedding widgets plus admin-panel model manager.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library for Ollama providing GenServer-based clients and LiveView chat examples.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from notes for summarization & Q&A.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial)
summary: Community npm wrapper that downloads & manages the Ollama binary inside node_modules for CI/CD.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama, Open WebUI, Chroma, qDrant & GPU flags.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-github-action
summary: GitHub Action to install & start Ollama in CI so you can run model tests on every PR.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers channel questions using Ollama models with thread support & rate limits.
